spreads fire to targets when on fire
requires a complete path to target before attacking

fields.title: Attack Types
fields.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Melee Attack Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows an entity to deal damage through a melee attack.

fields.title: Attack Once
fields.description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

fields.title: Attack Types
fields.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

fields.title: Can Spread On Fire
fields.description: If the entity is on fire, this allows the entity's target to catch on fire after being hit.

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Cooldown time (in seconds) between attacks.

fields.title: Inner Boundary Time Increase
fields.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

fields.title: Max Path Time
fields.description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

fields.title: Melee Fov
fields.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

fields.title: Min Path Time
fields.description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

fields.title: Attack
fields.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

fields.title: Kill
fields.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity kills the target.

fields.title: Outer Boundary Time Increase
fields.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

fields.title: Path Fail Time Increase
fields.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

fields.title: Path Inner Boundary
fields.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

fields.title: Path Outer Boundary
fields.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

fields.title: Random Stop Interval
fields.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

fields.title: Reach Multiplier
fields.description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

fields.title: Require Complete Path
fields.description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

fields.title: Track Target
fields.description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

fields.title: x Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: y Max Head Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
